mapper.select: SELECT "MEMBER".username, MOVIE_DB.movie_title, CASE WHEN INSTR(MOVIE_DB.movie_poster, '|') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(MOVIE_DB.movie_poster, 1, INSTR(MOVIE_DB.movie_poster, '|') - 1) ELSE MOVIE_DB.movie_poster END AS movie_poster FROM MOVIE_WISH_LIST INNER JOIN MOVIE_DB ON MOVIE_WISH_LIST.movie_num = MOVIE_DB.movie_num INNER JOIN "MEMBER" ON MOVIE_WISH_LIST.userid = "MEMBER".userid WHERE MOVIE_WISH_LIST.USERID = #{userid}
